title: Turkey expresses condolence over loss of lives in bus accident
content:
ISLAMABAD, June 8 (APP): The government of Turkey on Wednesday conveyed its condolences to the people and the government of Pakistan over the loss of lives in a bus accident in Balochistan province.
Turkish foreign ministry, in a press statement, expressed its grief over the loss of lives after a bus crashed into a ravine in Balochistan province of Pakistan.
“We wish Allah’s mercy upon those who lost their lives in the accident and convey our condolences to the friendly and brotherly people and Government of Pakistan,” it was added.
